processVariable.name: InstanceSummary
instancesStatuses
dataSeriesP

TWComponent.script: tw.local.sqlStatement select SnapshotName, ProjectAcronym, BPDReferenceID, isTip, count(distinct BPD_INSTANCE_ID) as NumberOfInstances, BPDName, applicationName, exposedVariables as ExposedVariableCount from ( select LS."NAME" as SnapshotName, LP.SHORT_NAME as ProjectAcronym, LBI.BPD_REF as BPDReferenceID, LBI.TIP as isTip, LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID, LBI.BPD_NAME as BPDName, LP.NAME as applicationName, count(distinct LBIV.VARIABLE_NAME) as exposedVariables from lsw_bpd_instance lbi, LSW_PROJECT lp, LSW_SNAPSHOT ls, LSW_USR_XREF lux, LSW_BPD_STATUS_CODES lbsc, LSW_BPD_INSTANCE_VARIABLES LBIV where LBI.SNAPSHOT_ID = LS.SNAPSHOT_ID and LS.PROJECT_ID = LP.PROJECT_ID and LBI.STARTER_ID = LUX.USER_ID(+) and LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID = LBIV.BPD_INSTANCE_ID group by LS."NAME", LP.SHORT_NAME, LBI.BPD_REF, lbsc.NAME, LBI.TIP, LBI.BPD_NAME, LP.NAME, LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID order by lbi.create_datetime DESC ) where exposedVariables > ? group by SnapshotName, ProjectAcronym, BPDReferenceID, isTip, BPDName, applicationName, exposedVariables order by ExposedVariableCount desc

ns17:scriptTask.name: Define SQL
ns17:scriptTask.ns17:script: tw.local.sqlStatement select SnapshotName, ProjectAcronym, BPDReferenceID, isTip, count(distinct BPD_INSTANCE_ID) as NumberOfInstances, BPDName, applicationName, exposedVariables as ExposedVariableCount from ( select LS."NAME" as SnapshotName, LP.SHORT_NAME as ProjectAcronym, LBI.BPD_REF as BPDReferenceID, LBI.TIP as isTip, LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID, LBI.BPD_NAME as BPDName, LP.NAME as applicationName, count(distinct LBIV.VARIABLE_NAME) as exposedVariables from lsw_bpd_instance lbi, LSW_PROJECT lp, LSW_SNAPSHOT ls, LSW_USR_XREF lux, LSW_BPD_STATUS_CODES lbsc, LSW_BPD_INSTANCE_VARIABLES LBIV where LBI.SNAPSHOT_ID = LS.SNAPSHOT_ID and LS.PROJECT_ID = LP.PROJECT_ID and LBI.STARTER_ID = LUX.USER_ID(+) and LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID = LBIV.BPD_INSTANCE_ID group by LS."NAME", LP.SHORT_NAME, LBI.BPD_REF, lbsc.NAME, LBI.TIP, LBI.BPD_NAME, LP.NAME, LBI.BPD_INSTANCE_ID order by lbi.create_datetime DESC ) where exposedVariables > ? group by SnapshotName, ProjectAcronym, BPDReferenceID, isTip, BPDName, applicationName, exposedVariables order by ExposedVariableCount desc

ns17:scriptTask.name: Script Task
